mobile.$description: Mobile viewport theme identifier. Used by components to determine mobile-specific responsive behavior and styling.

desktop.$description: Desktop viewport theme identifier. Used by components to determine desktop-specific responsive behavior and styling.

mult_static.$description: Base scaling multiplier for consistent sizing across the design system. Used as foundation for spacing, sizing, and responsive calculations.

0.$description: Base value for mobile viewports (0px and larger).

768.$description: Used for desktop viewports (768px and larger).
